pr_title: process ui events after test to avoid memory leak in tests

timeline.bodyText: Should this be called from closeEditors?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: good question. or from the baseclass
replies.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText: I've a preference towards pushing org.eclipse.xtext.ui.testing.AbstractHighlightingTest.waitForEventProcessing() into the AbstractWorkbenchTest and calling it from its tearDown.
replies.author: szarnekow
